description: Number of classes generated by function A007947 when applied to binomial coefficients.
formula: a(n) = Length[ Union[ Table[ A007947[ binomial[ n, k ] ], {k, 0, n} ] ] ]
example: For n=9 A007947({C(9,k)})={1,3,6,42,42,42,42,6,3,1} includes 4 distinct values so generating 4 classes of k values: {0,9},{1,8},{2,7} and {3,4,5,6}. So a(9)=4
author: _Labos Elemer_
